data.title: Love it for Breakfast!
data.text: This cafe certainly has a feel for it! I've been going for the past 27 years and can definitely say it is just wonderful! The staff is so welcoming and the food is just delicious! I'm not a big fan for Mexican dishes outside of my home, especially in restaurants, but I just love this place!

data.title: Great breakfast!
data.text:
I have been going to this restaurant for the past 26+ years. They serve a real g [d breakfast and lunch. Their coffee is great too. 
If it has withstood the test of time it's because of their good food and service!
*Ask for their home style waffles loaded with pecans.. Hmmmm good!

data.title: Used to eat there
data.text: Used to eat dinners there but last two times, food was not very tasty so stopped going. Maybe change of chef?

data.title: Here comes the train
data.text: This place has been here for years and years. Whomever owns it is hot on trains as there is train stuff every where. It is a combo of American and Mexican food. Very good breakfasts aand lunches. They are open 24 hours.

data.title: Best Authentic Mexican Food
data.text: If you want the most authentic Mexican food in the Valley  go to Taco Ole on Freddy Gonzales and Mcoll Rd in Edinburg TX

data.title: Quaint old school cafe run of the mill American style Mexican food.
data.text: The facility is nice old school cafe. The menu is mainly run of the mill American style Mexican food, enchiladas, beans, cheese. Didn't see any authentic Mexican offerings. The meal I had was ok but I wouldn't go out of my way to go there again.

data.title: What's happening to Junction Cafe?
data.text:
I've been frequenting this cafe for close to 5 years. The food has always been great, the waitresses had been there for years. You walked in, and it felt like family. My most recent visit has me missing the Junction of old. 
Whenever I visit, I have my little girl with me. There has never bee a question of atmosphere in this place. It was always perfect. Well, times have changed. The food quality is the same, same ole Junction. The prices are a bit higher, yet the portions aren't growing. This didn't get me. What got me was the staff. We sat around having dinner while the waitresses outright had a hang out. I heard a few bad words,some talk about putting hydros on a car, and enough gossip for a year. Clearly, an atmosphere of un professionalism I had never encountered here. Will we go back? No. The food alone is not enough to save Junction. If I want to hear bad words, orders yelled across the room, I'll take my family to a bar.

data.title: Great local eatery!
data.text: This has always been one of my favorite restaurants in my hometown. Weekend mornings are extra busy, but it is always worth the wait. Wait staff is always friendly & welcoming. Great value & quality. Definitely a good place to eat with nice "train" decor.

data.title: Lots of fun!
data.text: Loved the food.  Liked the servers!   Atmosphere great!  Prices realistic!  Can hardly  wait to go back again!
